definitions.example: Overseas branches of the company are doing well.

definitions.definition: (used with ethnicities, nationalities, or religious affiliations) Living (being resident) in a foreign country.
definitions.example: Overseas Chinese communities exist in North and South America.

definitions.definition: Across a sea; to or in an area across a sea.

definitions.example: He emigrated and now lives overseas.

definitions.definition: Across a sea; to an area across a sea.
